article.headline: Bowling Green 74, Buffalo 73
article.story: BOWLING GREEN, Ohio (AP) -- Martin Samarco scored 43 points and hit a 3-pointer with two seconds remaining to lead Bowling Green to a 74-73 victory over Buffalo on Sunday. The score was tied at 40 early in the second half, but Buffalo (8-6, 0-1 Mid-American Conference) pulled away on a 14-5 run that gave the Bulls a 54-45 lead with 14:39 remaining. Buffalo twice led by as much as 11 points before Bowling Green (10-4, 1-0) scored 12 straight points -- half from Samarco -- to take a 71-70 advantage with 1:33 left. A 3-pointer from Eric Moore, who led the Bulls with 35 points, put Buffalo ahead again with 38 seconds remaining before Samarco's 3-pointer gave the Falcons the win. Samarco was 16-of-24 shooting, including 7-of-12 3-pointers. Nate Miller had 13 points and five rebounds and Brian Guerin added 10 points and 10 assists. The Falcons took a 16-point lead with 6:17 remaining in the first half, but Buffalo went on a 17-2 run to cut the deficit to 36-35 at halftime. Moore made all but one of the Bulls' 3-pointers, shooting 11-of-16 from beyond the arc and 12-of-20 overall. Yassin Idbihi added 16 points and 12 rebounds. The Falcons shot 54 percent (27-of-50), compared with about 43 percent (23-of-53) from the Bulls. Buffalo outrebounded Bowling Green 35-26. The Falcons scored 29 points off 18 Buffalo turnovers.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
